title: Zephyr Break
content:
a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Zephyr Break is an spell exclusive to the Nyrulna Legendary Trident and unlocked by having proficiency on it. Zephyr Break is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflicting Status Ailments, buff Characters, or interacting with the environment.

Zephyr Break Information

Description: Emit a powerfull gale of wind that clears all clouds and pushes creatures back 5m, possibly inflicting Off Balance. Level: Lvl 2 spe
